free_text.Learning outcomes: Knowing the basic mechanisms and the latest developments on phytotechnologies.[br/]The use of green plants for the remediation of polluted sites and water, the improvement of food safety and the development of renewable energy sources contribute to sustainable land use and environmental management.[br/]
